io.delta.kernel

Interface Scan


  • public interface Scan
    An object representing a scan of a Delta table.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Expression getRemainingFilter()
      Get the remaining filter the Delta Kernel can not guarantee the data returned by it satisfies the filter.
      CloseableIterator<ColumnarBatch> getScanFiles(TableClient tableClient)
      Get an iterator of data files to scan.
      Row getScanState(TableClient tableClient)
      Get the scan state associate with the current scan.
      static CloseableIterator<DataReadResult> readData(TableClient tableClient, Row scanState, CloseableIterator<Row> scanFileRows, java.util.Optional<Expression> filter)
      Get the data from a given scan files with using the connector provider TableClient.

    • Method Detail

      • getScanFiles

        CloseableIterator<ColumnarBatch> getScanFiles(TableClient tableClient)
        Get an iterator of data files to scan.
        Parameters:
        tableClient - TableClient instance to use in Delta Kernel.
        Returns:
        data in ColumnarBatch format. Each row correspond to one scan file.

      • getRemainingFilter

        Expression getRemainingFilter()
        Get the remaining filter the Delta Kernel can not guarantee the data returned by it satisfies the filter. This filter is used by Delta Kernel to do data skipping whenever possible.
        Returns:
        Remaining filter as Expression.

      • getScanState

        Row getScanState(TableClient tableClient)
        Get the scan state associate with the current scan. This state is common to all survived files.
        Parameters:
        tableClient - TableClient instance to use in Delta Kernel.
        Returns:
        Scan state in Row format.

      • readData

        static CloseableIterator<DataReadResult> readData(TableClient tableClient,
                                                  Row scanState,
                                                  CloseableIterator<Row> scanFileRows,
                                                  java.util.Optional<Expression> filter)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Get the data from a given scan files with using the connector provider TableClient.
        Parameters:
        tableClient - Connector provided TableClient implementation.
        scanState - Scan state returned by getScanState(TableClient)
        scanFileRows - an iterator of Rows. Each Row represents one scan file from the ColumnarBatch returned by getScanFiles(TableClient)
        filter - An optional filter that can be used for data skipping while reading the scan files.
        Returns:
        Data read from the scan file as an iterator of ColumnarBatches and ColumnVector pairs. The ColumnVector represents a selection vector of type boolean that has the same size as the data ColumnarBatch. A value of true at a given index indicates the row with the same index from the data ColumnarBatch should be considered and a value of false at a given index indicates the row with the same index in data ColumnarBatch should be ignored. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the iterator.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when error occurs reading the data.
